author: Louis Claudel

text: Bought this on Steam because it looked like Earthbound. The moment I started playing it confirmed that it is indeed a direct inspiration, mixed with a western setting... and that makes me smile. It starts pretty slow and the combat system feels wonky at first, but it's starting to pick up (I just finished the Whisker Woods), hopefully I enjoy the rest of the journey. The soundtrack is good enough so far, with this theme being a highlight. It made me go check out who was the composer and to my surprise, it's Jake Kaufman! It's nice to see him tackle SNES-style music, this particular theme screams Squaresoft SNES RPG.
